data.text: Yahweh, I will sing forever about the ways you faithfully love me;
I will tell people that you will faithfully love us forever,
Yahweh said, “I have made an agreement with David, whom I chose to serve me.
‘I will enable various ones of your descendants to always be kings;
Yahweh, I desire that all those beings who are in [MTY] heaven will praise you for the wonderful things that you do,
There is no one [RHQ] in heaven who can be compared with you, Yahweh.
When your holy angels gather together,
O Yahweh, God Almighty, there is no one [RHQ] who is powerful like you are;
You rule over the powerful seas;
You are the one who crushed and killed the great sea monster named Rahab.
The heavens are yours, and the earth is yours;
You created everything from the north to the south.
◄You/Your arms► are very powerful;
◄Your rule [MTY] over us is based on/As you rule over us, you are always► treating people fairly and justly,
Yahweh, happy are the people who worship you with joyful shouts,
Every day, throughout the day, they rejoice in what you [MTY] have done,
You give us your glorious strength;
Yahweh, you gave us the one who protects us [MET];
Long ago you spoke in a vision to one of your servants/prophets, saying,
That man is David, the one who will serve me faithfully,
I [MTY] will always strengthen him;
His enemies will never find ways to defeat him,
I will crush his enemies in front of him
I will always be loyal to him and faithfully love him
I will cause ◄his kingdom/the area that he rules► to include all the land from the Mediterranean Sea to the Euphrates River.
He will say to me, ‘You are my Father,
I will give him the rights/privileges that a man’s firstborn son has [MET];
I will always be loyal to him,
I will establish a line of his descendants that will never end,
But, if some of his descendants disobey my laws,
if they disregard my requirements
I will punish them severely [MTY]
But I will not stop faithfully loving David,
I will not break the agreement that I made with him;
Once I made a solemn promise to David, and that will never change,
I promised that the line of kings descended from him will go on forever;
That line will ◄be as permanent/last as long► as the moon
But Yahweh, now you have rejected [DOU] David!
It seems that you have broken the agreement that you made with your servant, David;
You have torn down the walls that protect his city,
All those who pass by plunder/steal his possessions;
You have enabled his enemies to defeat him;
You have caused his sword to become useless,
You have caused his splendor to end (OR, You have taken away his power
You have caused him to look old when he is still young
O Yahweh, how long will this continue?
Do not forget that life is very short;
No one can [RHQ] keep on living and never die;
Yahweh, you promised long ago
Yahweh, do not forget that people insult me!
Yahweh, your enemies insult your chosen king!
I hope/desire that Yahweh will be praised forever!
